questions: Q. 1. How was the maritime silk route useful for Vietnam?
answers: Ans. Vietnam was also linked to what has called the maritime silk route. It brought goods, people and ideas. Other networks of trade connected it to the hinterlands.

questions: Q. 2. What were the two bases of colonial economy in Vietnam?
answers: Ans. Bases of colonial economy in Vietnam :  Rice cultivation,  Rubber Plantation.

questions: Q. 3. When did the the French arrive in Vietnam?
Q. 4. When and how French Indo-China was formed?
answers: Ans. Conquest of Tonkin and Anaam in 1887, led to the formation of French Indo-China.
